patthana23.57:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.57:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.57:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
